Component: codemirror (vendored build)
Source: npm packages (codemirror@6.0.2, @codemirror/* as pinned in package.json)
Upstream repo: https://github.com/codemirror/dev
Date: 2026-01-16
Build tool: esbuild (see package.json devDependencies)
Build tool version: 0.27.2

Notes:
- `cm.js` is treated as a third-party artifact. Do not hand-edit it.
- Rebuild using `third_party/codemirror/build/build.mjs`.
